title: Kurt Volker resigns as US special envoy to Ukraine
text:
Kurt Volker has resigned as U.S. special envoy to Ukraine, a source familiar has told ABC News.

Interested in Trump Administration? Add Trump Administration as an interest to stay up to date on the latest Trump Administration news, video, and analysis from ABC News. Add Interest

News of Volker's resignation was first reported by The State Press, the student newspaper at Arizona State University.

Democrats still are expecting Volker to show up for his deposition on Capitol Hill on Oct. 3, sources tell ABC News.

Valentyn Ogirenko/Reuters, FILE

This is a breaking story. Please check back for updates.
description: Kurt Volker has resigned as U.S. special envoy to the Ukraine.
